audio_back_track: {{author}} Used the button to go back to the back track.
audio_pause_track: {{author}} Used the button to pause the track.
audio_stop_track: {{author}} Used the button to stop the track and clears the queue.
audio_resume_track: {{author}} Used the button to resume the track.
audio_next_track: {{author}} Used the button to play the next track.
audio_no_back_track: {{author}} Used the button to go back to the back track but there is no back track.
